profile:
Garec Cleaning Systems is a family owned rug and carpet cleaning company based in St. Catharines. 
We offer both typical cleanings and specialized carpet care services, such as floodwater clean-up, smoke and odor removal, and anti-static protection.

55 Years of Success
We have cleaned carpets for more than 55 yearsâ€”a fact that serves as one of our greatest achievements as well as proof of our excellent service. 
Through the course of more than half a century of existence, we have successfully served countless residential and commercial clients throughout Niagara.

For more information about our company or to inquire about our services, please feel free to call - 905-734-3284
